Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 1 wicket (with 4 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan have a perfect record against Afghanistan - having won both the matches in 2013 and 2019
Afghanistan have shown they no longer just rely on the spin trio of Rashid Khan, Mujeeb Ur Rahman and captain Mohammad Nabi for wickets anymore
Rahmanullah Gurbaz is coming off an 84 off 45 balls against Sri Lanka - albeit in a losing cause
Miscellaneous Highlights: The team batting first will be looking to score big, as has been the case in two out of three matches played in Sharjah
Pakistan posted 193 against Hong Kong, and Sri Lanka chased down Afghanistan's 175
Others: Rizwan, who injured his knee on Sunday, has been cleared to play by the Pakistan medical team and will keep his place both at the top of the order, and behind the wicket
